remarks: Closure of the vector to functional map.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
hvmap1o2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hvmap1o2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmap1o2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hvmap1o2.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hvmap1o2.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmap1o2.f $e |- F = ( Base ` C ) $.
hvmap1o2.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` C ) $.
hvmap1o2.m $e |- M = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmap1o2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hvmapcl2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hvmapcl2 $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` X ) e. ( F \ { O } ) ) $.
